Title: AniMusic Player
Description: AniMusic Player is a spin off music player from AniPlayer, but more music centric. It is very simple and easy to use & learn. And best of all, its developed using the easy to understand Visual Basic .NET using Microsoft's WMP ActiveX Control.
HomeWiki:
AniMusic Player has been superseded by Baka MPlayer

Baka MPlayer is the new mplayer2 based media player that I am working on and it uses a lot less memory and cpu cycles than AniMusic Player. It also looks a lot nicer.

Totally rewritten for speed and efficiency, you should seriously check it out!

Main Website: http://bakamplayer.netii.net/

Git: https://github.com/godly-devotion/Baka-MPlayer

AniMusic Player Description

AniMusic Player is a spin off music player from AniPlayer, but more music centric. It is very simple and easy to use & learn. And best of all, its developed using the easy to understand Visual Basic .NET using Microsoft's WMP ActiveX Control.
